title: Supplier Onboarder
description: Lucky you; one of your retailers sent you an invitation so that you both save time working on product information. Welcome!

first-steps.title: First steps: what is the Onboarder?
first-steps.description: Let's start with the beginning and learn more about the Supplier Onboarder: what is it? Where do the information come from? What information does it handle?

manage-products.title: Manage products
manage-products.description: Time for a deep dive into the Onboarder product management: everything you need to know to become a Supplier Onboarder Jedi is detailed here.
